张江校区短驳班车: Shuttle Bus in Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park
张江地铁站2号口（大桥六线站南侧）: Entrance 2#, Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park Sta. (in the south of 大桥六线 bus stop)
于该时刻从环科路发车，随到即开，预计20分钟: departed at this time from Huanke Rd, re-depart on arrival in about 20 mins
于该时刻从地铁站发车，随到即开，预计20分钟: departed at this time from metro station, re-depart on arrival in about 20 mins
金科路地铁站（祖冲之路公交站台）发车: depart from the bus stop on Zuchongzhi Rd (near Jinke Rd Sta.)
海科路科苑路（下车请提前告之师傅）: Haike Rd, Keyuan Rd (tell the bus driver in advance)
本班车途经上海光源与蛋白质中心: This bus passes through SSRF & NCPSS
生命学院楼前十字路口（仅工作日17:15、17:45、18:45、19:40班次: Crossroad near the SLST building (only stop at 17:15, 17:45, 18:45, 19:40 on weekdays)
该班次经停生命学院楼前十字路口: This bus passes through the crossroad near the SLST building
